definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: caper-berry (as stimulating desire) Ec 12:5 (v. GFM:JBL 1891, 55 ff.; so LXX Vulgate, Mish. [[אביונות]], cf. NHWB; v. also SyrVer; i.e. capparis spinosa, cf. Ri:HWB; so Thes, Ew De, etc.; but Wetzst in De (Germ. ed. 1875) proposes [[אֶבְיוֹנׇה]] (as fem. of [[אביון]]) the poor soul in sense = [[נִשְׁמָתוֹ הָאֶבְיוֹנׇה]] cf. Symm SyrVer, where double translation).
